title: Zara Zara Lyrics Chikku Bukku Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Aengengeyo naan zara zara.
Aedaiyaillamal zara zara.
Parakinrene para para.
Medhakindrene zara zara.
Parakalaaaaaaaaaaaaaam
heyyyyyyyyi zara zara. . . (2 times)

Un viral nuniyil en viral nulaithu
IvvUzhagengum pogalam
Un thalai mudiyil en idhal padhithu
nam payanangal pesalam
Â 
Thoduvaanam thodavendum
Va innumkonja tholaive...
Unnai enmel vizha cheiyya
varam nooru nooru ketpen
zara zara ..

Aengengeyo naan zara zara.
Aedaiyaillamal zara zara.
Parakinrene para para.
Medhakindrene zara zara.

En immaigalile uniru vizhigal
Vandhu serudhey
En thanimaiyile un ninaivazhaigal
Sutriyum vandhu meyudhey

Oru boomi oru vaanam
andhu podhavillai namakee..
Pudhudaaga manam thoonda
ini yaedhu ellai azhagae ..
Heyyyyyyyyyyi..
